question_text:
Question 34 
[Geotechnical Engineering : Origin of Soil & Their Properties]
An embankment is constructed with soil by maintaining the degree of saturation as 75% during 
compaction.  The specific gravity of soil is 2.68 and the moisture content is 17% during compaction.
Consider the unit weight of water as 
3
10 kN / m
 .  The dry unit weight (in 
3
kN / m
 ) of the compacted soil
is ________ (rounded off to 2 decimal places). 
Ans. 16.60 to 16.80
